weapon_description: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.
weapon_skill_description: Gain 24% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by 6.4% per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.
